Table_Dimension_Header.label: Table_Dimension_Header
Table_Dimension_Header.query:
MasterHierarchy = load "Master_Hierarchy"; q= group MasterHierarchy by 'all';
q = foreach q generate "    Group    " as 'Metric ',"    Name    " as 'Metric',"    Measure    " as 'Rate';

column_1.label: column_1

parameters.text: Use the "Current_1" definition for manual modifications, the Quarter 1-4 are predefined and should not be changed.
This dashboard is currently not available in mobile.

EXAMPLE FOR SETUP 12/21/2017
->Modification only in the static step "DASHBOARD_PARAMETER"

 "type": "staticflex",
                "values": [
                    {
                        "display": "CURRENT_1",
                        "YTD_ACV": "[\"April\",\"February\",\"July\",\"June\",\"March\",\"May\",\"August\",\"September\",\"October\",\"November\"]",
                        "YTD_AOV": "[\"October\"]",
                        "YTD_ATT": "[\"April\",\"February\",\"July\",\"June\",\"March\",\"May\",\"August\",\"September\",\"October\"]",
                        "YTD_PIPEGEN": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_HC": "[\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_SW": "[\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_CC": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_CC_SITES": "[\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_DEALS": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_LOGO": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_REDACCOUNTS": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_T_P": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_TRANSACTION": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_AVAILABILITY": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_EVENTS": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_OTHER": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_EBC": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_CUSTOMER": "[\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_SHARE": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "YTD_CSG": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_ACV": "[\"April\",\"February\",\"July\",\"June\",\"March\",\"May\",\"August\",\"September\",\"October\",\"November\"]",
                        "Quarters_AOV": "[\"April\",\"July\",\"October\"]",
                        "Quarters_ATT": "[\"April\",\"February\",\"July\",\"June\",\"March\",\"May\",\"August\",\"September\",\"October\"]",
                        "Quarters_PIPEGEN": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_HC": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_SW": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_CC": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_CC_SITES": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_DEALS": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_LOGO": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_REDACCOUNTS": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_T_P": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_TRANSACTION": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_AVAILABILITY": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_EVENTS": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_OTHER": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_EBC": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_CUSTOMER": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_SHARE": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]",
                        "Quarters_CSG": "[\"FYQ1\",\"FYQ2\",\"FYQ3\"]"
                    },

Explanation step "DASHBOARD_PARAMETER"

For each Source file the YTD and max Quarters can be defined. 
YTD = Year to date and defines the YTD calculation.
Quarters= maximum Quarters/Month per Source which should be shown in the Dashboard. 
With this setup YTD and Quarters can be controlled individually. Please make sure the setup is matching.
If you select Quarter 1-4 make sure you change the "Start" value in the step "DASHBOARD_PARAMETER" accordingly. Default is "Current_1"
METRIC PARAMETER CONTROL for YTD column
